name: Mines of Volantis
description:
Crash landing on the planet Volantis, you mine through its surface in search of a way home.

Features:

*Procedural world: The world is uniquely generated each time. You will never know what resources and artifacts you will find next time!

*Collect: Find valuable resources to sell them and to refuel your harvester.

*Upgrades: To achieve greater depths, upgrade to a bigger fuel tank, or maybe a bigger cargo bay? The choice is yours.

*Research: Unlock new technology like advanced thrusters and the personal teleporter!

*Escape: Construct an emergency communication beacon to send out a call for help.
